alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marinette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 11:02PM CDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin...Michigan... Menominee River near Menominee River Below Kingsford Dam affecting Florence, Dickinson and Marinette Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Menominee River near Menominee River Below Kingsford Dam. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:35 PM CDT Saturday the flow was 15,231.0 cfs. - Recent Activity...The maximum river flow in the 24 hours ending at 10:35 PM CDT Saturday was 15,246.0 cfs. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood flow is 15,000.0 cfs. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon.
